name: TV
description: The client, an unemployed single mother with a 8 yrs old daughter and with mental health conditions, will be relocating to a new flat. They require a TV as the current one is not functioning, but client is facing financial difficulties in replacing one. Thank you so much for your involvement in helping the client and her daughter transition to a fresh start. Please contact me @9724 4034 *Delivery is required to be arranged by kind donor.

passiton.name: TV console
passiton.description: Accessories, TV, toys are not included.

name: TV
description: A low-income family with 5 young children is in need of a new TV as their current one is no longer functional. The TV would greatly benefit their pregnant mother, providing entertainment and helping her manage the household while her husband is at work.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Queenstown
contact.name: Yu Ki

passiton.name: TV console
passiton.description: Accessories, TV, toys are not included.

name: Commode
description: Client is the sole breadwinner and caring for her mother who was diagnosed with stroke in 2023. Mother will benefit from receiving a commode due to her low mobility.

passiton.description: Commode in good working condition available

name: Walking stick
description:
Senior has weak legs and needs a walking stick to ambulate herself at home but lacks the financial capacity to purchase one. 

You can contact me at 91271945.

name: Bed frame
description: The client is a homemaker with 5 school-going children, aged between 25 – 3 years old.  Her husband aged 48 has suffered from bipolar disorder since he was 18 years old.  He later suffered from a stroke in Jan 2024 and passed away on 15 March due to a heart attack. Currently, the assistance provided barely covers their basic food and necessities. The family of 6 living in an HDB 3-room flat and they sleep on the mattress on the floor.

name: Table
description:
The family of 6 consists of parents, elderly grandmother and 3 young children aged 1,2 and 7 years old. They are facing significant financial difficulties.
They are requesting for a table (around 1metre in height) to place their cooking stove on.

name: Mattress
description: Client is an elderly staying alone in a one-room rental flat. As he suffers from insonmia, client shared that he spends much of his waking moments on his mattress. His mattress, one he has been using for over a decade, is visibly filty and with its cushioning flat. He expressed that he could not afford a new mattress.
